definitions.definition: Any insect of the species of flying, biting, blood-sucking two-winged flies encountered in sandy areas.
One of the Talitridae family of marine amphipod crustaceans .

main_definition: Any insect of the species of flying, biting, blood-sucking two-winged flies encountered in sandy areas.
secondary_definitions: One of the Talitridae family of marine amphipod crustaceans .
